actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a basic $5,000 of an individual or married couple, for amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefit.

summary.text: Provides a basic $5,000 exemption from income tax under the Internal Revenue Code in the case of an individual or a married couple, for amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefits. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 72a)

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a basic $5,000 of an individual or married couple, for amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefit.
